card1.title: Other Providers
card1.desc: Often fragmented solutions, different contacts for internet, POS, and cloud.

card2.title: Classic IT Support
card2.desc: Usually reacts only when something breaks. High hourly rates, travel costs, and little proactivity.

card3.title: Any Tec Blueprint
card3.desc: Holistic architecture. Proactive monitoring and scalable standard processes.

faq.title: Frequent
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about starting with Any Tec.

items.q: How quickly can we connect new locations?
items.a: Thanks to our blueprints, we can often prepare and ship network infrastructure for new locations within a few days. Plug & Play on site.

items.q: Do you use cloud services like Microsoft Azure?
items.a: Yes, we rely on proven platforms like the Microsoft Cloud (incl. Azure Services) for maximum stability, security, and scalability.

items.q: Do you offer support for POS systems?
items.a: We ensure the robust infrastructure that modern POS systems need (stable connection, VLANs) and work directly with providers in case of issues.
We segment networks so that sensitive data (e.g., from customers or in Women-Only Spaces) is strictly separated from public guest Wi-Fi. Security comes first.
We offer flexible models. One-time prices for project setups, monthly terms with fair notice periods for Managed Services.

items.q: Do you also take over existing IT?
items.a: Yes, we analyze the current state and migrate step-by-step into a cleanly managed structure without disrupting your operations.

finalCta.title: Talk to us about your project
finalCta.desc: No waiting loops. Real experts. Immediate solutions.

contact.subtitle: Ready for the next level of your IT? Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

hero.title: IT & Cloud Ops for Enterprise Customers
hero.description: From cloud to cable in the ground. We take care of tech so you can focus on your business.

azure.title: Microsoft Azure &
azure.description: We build your cloud foundation. Scalable, secure, and ready for the future. Whether Lift & Shift or Cloud-Native.

terraform.title: Terraform IaC
terraform.desc: Infrastructure as Code. Reproducible and versioned.

hybrid.title: Hybrid Cloud
hybrid.desc: Securely connect your datacenter to the cloud.

identity.title: Identity Management
identity.desc: Secure access with Entra ID (Azure AD).

cost.title: Cost Management
cost.desc: We optimize your cloud spending sustainably.

m365.title: Microsoft 365
m365.description: The complete Office suite, Teams telephony, and SharePoint. Perfectly configured for remote teams. We migrate your data securely and train your team.

network.title: Enterprise Networking
network.description: From Next-Gen Firewall to AI-based Endpoint Protection. We secure your infrastructure holistically. Network, endpoints, and cloud.

server.title: Server Room Management
server.desc: We take care of your racks. From clean cabling to hardware replacement. Order is security.

moves.title: Office Moves & Rollouts
moves.desc: Office relocation or site closure? We dismantle, transport securely, and rebuild at the new location.

lifecycle.title: Hardware Lifecycle
lifecycle.desc: Procurement, installation, and professional disposal of old devices. Your inventory always up to date.

card.title: Expert Hardware
card.desc: Our team works directly on hardware. No outsourcing to subcontractors.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: No waiting loops. Direct line to certified experts. We solve problems before they stop your business.

l1.title: User Helpdesk
l1.desc: Quick help for daily problems. Forgot password, printer strike, or Outlook issues? We are there immediately.

l2.title: System Administration
l2.desc: Deep troubleshooting, server maintenance, user management, and configuration changes.

l3.title: Expert Engineering
l3.desc: Architecture issues, complex security incidents, and infrastructure design by Senior Engineers.

setups.title: Setups
setups.description: Choose the setups that fit your space. Selection automatically appears in the contact form.

gastro.name: Gastro Setup
gastro.details: Optimized for high frequency and reliability. We strictly separate POS systems from guest WiFi and seamlessly integrate digital kitchen monitors.

retail.name: Retail Setup
retail.details: Securely connect all branches via VPN. Central updates for your scanners and POS run at night so daily business is not disturbed.

wellness.name: Wellness Setup
wellness.details: Create a relaxed atmosphere without tech frustration. We ensure perfect coverage for smart check-ins and complete silence in privacy zones.

workspace.name: Workspace Setup
workspace.details: Flexible work needs flexible WiFi. Enterprise-level security, but simple enough for guests to log in independently.

entertainment.name: Entertainment Setup
entertainment.details: When thousands of people go online at once, nothing can wobble. High-performance WiFi and redundant internet lines for events.

salon.name: Salon Setup
salon.details: Stable internet for your booking system and tablet POS. Plus a separate network for your clients so they can surf during treatment.

ecommerce.name: Online Store Setup
ecommerce.details: The backend for your shop. We integrate warehouse systems, create interfaces to shipping providers, and monitor server performance 24/7.

contact.title: Does a setup fit for you?
contact.description: Your selection will be sent with the form. Feel free to add details, we'll get back to you in < 24h.
